trans-unit.source: Specifies the unit of measurement.
trans-unit.target: 指定度量單位。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType> enumeration represents the different supported measurement units.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType>列舉，代表不同的支援的度量單位。

trans-unit.source: Measurements can be represented in pixels, points, picas, inches, millimeters, centimeters, percentages, em, or ex.
trans-unit.target: 量值可以以像素、 點、 picas、 英吋、 公釐為單位、 公分為單位、 百分比、 em、 或 ex。

trans-unit.source: A Point is a unit of measurement that represents 1/72 of an inch.
trans-unit.target: 點是度量的代表 1/72 英吋單位。

trans-unit.source: A Pica is a unit that equals 12 points.
trans-unit.target: Pica 是單位等於 12 點。

trans-unit.source: A Percentage is a unit of measurement that is relative to a parent element.
trans-unit.target: 百分比是度量的相對於父元素單位。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the font size of a paragraph is 10 pixels, you can place a phrase inside the paragraph with a font size specified as 200%.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果段落的字型大小是 10 個像素為單位，您可以指定為 200%的字型大小放置在段落的片語。

trans-unit.source: The font size of the phrase becomes twice the font size of the paragraph, or 20 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 片語的字型大小會變成兩次段落或 20 像素的字型大小。

trans-unit.source: An Em is a unit of measurement that is relative to the height of a parent element's font.
trans-unit.target: Em 是度量的相對於父項目之字型的高度單位。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the font size of a paragraph is 10 pixels, you can place a phrase inside the paragraph with a font size specified as 2 em.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果 10 個像素的段落字型大小，您可以指定為 2 的 em 字型大小放置段落的句子。

trans-unit.source: The font size of the phrase becomes twice the font size of the paragraph, or 20 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 片語的字型大小會變成兩次段落或 20 像素的字型大小。

trans-unit.source: An Ex is a unit of measurement that is relative to the height of the lowercase letter x of the parent element's font.
trans-unit.target: Ex 是度量的相對於父項目之字型的小寫字母 x 高度單位。

trans-unit.source: For example if the font size of a paragraph is 10 pixels, you can place a phrase inside the paragraph with a font size specified as 2 ex.
trans-unit.target: 例如如果段落的字型大小是 10 個像素為單位，您可以放置在段落內片語字型的大小指定為 2 例如。

trans-unit.source: The font size of the phrase becomes twice the font size of a lowercase letter x in the paragraph.
trans-unit.target: 片語的字型大小會變成兩倍的小寫字母 x 段落中的字型大小。

trans-unit.source: Measurement is in centimeters.
trans-unit.target: 度量單位為公分。

trans-unit.source: Measurement is relative to the height of the parent element's font.
trans-unit.target: 度量單位相對於父項目字型的高度。

trans-unit.source: Measurement is relative to the height of the lowercase letter x of the parent element's font.
trans-unit.target: 度量單位相對於父項目字型之小寫字母 x 的高度。

trans-unit.source: Measurement is in inches.
trans-unit.target: 度量單位為英吋。

trans-unit.source: Measurement is in millimeters.
trans-unit.target: 度量單位為公釐。

trans-unit.source: Measurement is a percentage relative to the parent element.
trans-unit.target: 度量單位是父項目的相對百分比。

trans-unit.source: Measurement is in picas.
trans-unit.target: 度量單位為 Pica。

trans-unit.source: A pica represents 12 points.
trans-unit.target: 一個 Pica 表示 12 個點數。

trans-unit.source: Measurement is in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 度量單位為像素。

trans-unit.source: Measurement is in points.
trans-unit.target: 度量單位為點數。

trans-unit.source: A point represents 1/72 of an inch.
trans-unit.target: 一個點數表示 1/72 英吋。
